name: Creality CR-X

extruders.select:
T0 ;switch to extruder 1
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 F2000 E93 ;load filament
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
M104 S{material_print_temperature}
extruders.deselect:
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 F800 E-5 ;short retract
G1 F2400 X295 Y265 ;move near prime tower
G1 F2000 E-93 ;long retract for filament removal
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G90

pre_gcode: M104 S{temp}       ; need to heat the nozzle
M104 S{temp}       ; need to heat the nozzle
M109 S{temp} ;Set Extruder Temperature and Wait
M190 S{bed_temp}; Wait for bed temperature to reach target temp
G1 F3000 X5 Y10 Z0.2 ;move to prime start position
G1 F600 X160 E15 ;prime nozzle in a line
post_gcode: G1 F3000 X0 Y270  ;move bed for easy part removal
